title: Warhammers
content:
the thoughts of certain creatures while talking to them.

Ketheric's Warhammer

1d10 (1d8) +1 Bludgeoning+1d4 Psychic

1d10 (1d8) +2 Bludgeoning

1d10 (1d8) +2 Bludgeoning

Weapon Enchantment +2

Homing Weapon: This weapon will return to its owner when thrown.Dwarven Thrower: A dwarf throwing this warhammer deals an extra 1d8 Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large, Huge, or Gargantuan creature, the strike deals an additional 2d8 Bludgeoning damage.
